001package edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.adapter;
002
003import android.content.Context;
004import android.view.LayoutInflater;
005import android.view.View;
006import android.view.ViewGroup;
007import android.widget.ArrayAdapter;
008import androidx.annotation.ColorInt;
009import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
010import androidx.annotation.Nullable;
011import androidx.core.content.ContextCompat;
012import com.google.android.material.color.MaterialColors;
013import edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.R;
014import edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.databinding.ItemGuessesBinding;
015import edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.model.Guess;
016import java.util.List;
017
018/**
019 * Public class that extends ArrayAdapter and works as a GuessesAdapter.
020 */
021public class GuessesAdapter extends ArrayAdapter<Guess> {
022
023  private final LayoutInflater inflater;
024  @ColorInt
025  private final int correct;
026  @ColorInt
027  private final int incorrect;
028
029  /**
030   * This adapter is used to change the background color of the hints for the team you guessed in a game.
031   * @param context context
032   * @param guesses List<guesses>
033   */
034  public GuessesAdapter(@NonNull Context context, @NonNull List<Guess> guesses) {
035    super(context, R.layout.item_guesses, guesses);
036    inflater = LayoutInflater.from(context);
037    correct = ContextCompat.getColor(context, R.color.correct);
038    incorrect = ContextCompat.getColor(context, R.color.incorrect);
039  }
040
041  @NonNull
042  @Override
043  public View getView(int position, @Nullable View convertView, @NonNull ViewGroup parent) {
044    Guess guess = getItem(position);
045    ItemGuessesBinding binding = (convertView != null)
046        ? ItemGuessesBinding.bind(convertView)
047        : ItemGuessesBinding.inflate(inflater, parent, false);
048    binding.teamName.setText(guess.pick().getName());
049    binding.teamName.setBackgroundColor(
050        guess.pick().getName().equals(guess.secret().getName()) ? correct : incorrect);
051    binding.teamLocation.setText(guess.pick().getLocation());
052    binding.teamLocation.setBackgroundColor(
053        guess.pick().getLocation().equals(guess.secret().getLocation()) ? correct : incorrect);
054    binding.yearFormed.setText(String.valueOf(guess.pick().getYearCreated()));
055    binding.yearFormed.setBackgroundColor(
056        guess.pick().getYearCreated() == guess.secret().getYearCreated() ? correct : incorrect);
057    binding.kitColor.setText(guess.pick().getPrimaryColor());
058    binding.kitColor.setBackgroundColor(
059        guess.pick().getPrimaryColor().equals(guess.secret().getPrimaryColor()) ? correct : incorrect);
060    return binding.getRoot();
061  }
062}
